cves.vulnerabilityName: Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
cves.shortDescription: Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus contains an authentication bypass vulnerability affecting the REST API URLs which allow for remote code execution.

cves.vulnerabilityName: Veeam Backup & Replication Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
cves.shortDescription: The Veeam Distribution Service in the Backup & Replication application allows unauthenticated users to access internal API functions. A remote attacker can send input to the internal API which may lead to uploading and executing of malicious code.

cves.vulnerabilityName: Veeam Backup & Replication Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
cves.shortDescription: The Veeam Distribution Service in the Backup & Replication application allows unauthenticated users to access internal API functions. A remote attacker can send input to the internal API which may lead to uploading and executing of malicious code.
